coreAttributes.name: nogasm necklace
coreAttributes.description: Some see this as a punishment tool, some call it a crutch to help their fetish, some even say underground cults that worship Angels use these as symbols of fighting one's selfish nature. What these necklaces do is making an orgasm impossible during regular sex. As an alternative to being worn around the neck, it would be possible to wrap the chain around your wrist.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before fastening the necklace around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] necklace, before taking it off from around [npc.her] neck.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] necklace, before taking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] necklace, before yanking it off from around [npc2.her] neck.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] [npc.her] necklace around [npc.her] wrist and then [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the necklace around [npc2.namePos] wrist and then [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(wrap)] the necklace around [npc2.namePos] wrist and then tightly [npc.verb(fasten)] it in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc.her] necklace, before unwrapping it from around [npc.her] wrist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] necklace, before unwrapping it from around [npc2.her] wrist.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unfasten)] [npc2.namePos] necklace, before snatching it off [npc2.her] wrist.
